title: As if I know anything
author: VD
content_html:
A radio station in Atlanta contacted me about coming on to talk about the Foley piece. I declined, of course, but I thought that the invitation was interesting. Obviously the scandal is of massiveinterest if columnists as completely out of the mainstream loop as I am are being sought for opinions.

I read some comments from someone claiming to be a former page who mentioned that they’d been warned about two other congressmen besides Foley, so this thing looks likely to spread and take a few more scalps before it’s over.
content_text:
A radio station in Atlanta contacted me about coming on to talk about the Foley piece.  I declined, of course, but I thought that the invitation was interesting.  Obviously the scandal is of massiveinterest if columnists as completely out of the mainstream loop as I am are being sought for opinions.
I read some comments from someone claiming to be a former page who mentioned that they’d been warned about two other congressmen besides Foley, so this thing looks likely to spread and take a few more scalps before it’s over.
